text: Suds & Scissors has become our go-to grooming spot ever since our last visit. The groomers are not only skilful and gentle, but also incredibly knowledgeable—especially when it comes to breeds like our Scottish Terrier, Luna. Their expertise really shows in how they handle her specific grooming needs, and the results speak for themselves. Luna has never looked better. The team always makes the experience peaceful and stress-free for both her and us. Highly recommended!

Suds and Scissors is my go to place now for my dogs’ grooming and supplies! The dogs are comfortable there and are very well taken care of by the friendly and welcoming team. Highly recommended if you are looking for a place to pamper your dogs!

Our french bulldog Molly has been going to Suds & Scissors for the past 3 years and they are definitely her favourite groomer. She always comes out looking so happy and feeling so clean! Beyond providing a high quality grooming service, they also genuinely care about her wellbeing which we are so grateful for.

The team here have taken amazing care of my puppy and she looks and feels great every time! Also appreciate that they share great advice on how to take steps at home to help our puppy be more comfortable with grooming in general.

I’ve known the lovely sisters at Suds & Sisters from the very year they opened their doors at Bukit Timah. They helped groom my 2 Pomeranian brothers, Kye & Kori over the course of 15 years until they passed away last year. Now they look after Talia who was quite difficult to groom when she was a puppy. She’s thankfully since improved.
Adele, Daphne & their team are professional, meticulous, friendly & wise. They shower their doggy clients with lots of love & cuddles & provide very personalized service. Kye, Kori & now Talia always look & smell fabulous after their grooming. They genuinely care for their clients & that shines through in the accolades they receive from happy, satisfied clients. So please book your appointments in advance as they are very popular!
On a personal note, I always feel happy browsing around their clean, organized treasure cove of a shop & invariably walk out with lots of goodies for my fur babies! I love my chats with Adele & Daphne & couldn’t recommend their excellent services more highly. Thank you so much for having been such kind angels to my Pomeranians.
